thread.title: Mark Gonzales’ Cartoon Drawings Headline a New Capsule Collection
thread.title_full: Mark Gonzales’ Cartoon Drawings Headline a New Capsule Collection

author: Marcus Cho
title: Mark Gonzales’ Cartoon Drawings Headline a New Capsule Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 11 images from this gallery. 
Mark Gonzales’ name is almost legendary in nature – and now, after starring in a couple of adidas’ “LA Stories” series videos , the famed skateboarder has plastered his artistic stylings on a small capsule collection.
Each piece features a different version of Gonzales’ cartoon-style drawings ranging from a flock of what appears to be smiley-faced birds, to a Dalmatian on a sweatshirt. You’ll also find that the collection offers an array of casual and daily wear-friendly options, such as shirts, crewnecks, drawstring bags, and totes.
The new Mark Gonzales collection is now available at select United Arrows and Beauty & Youth retail locations in Japan.
